ValidationRule.description: Enter Customer Due Date Reason Change first time when the user changes the Customer Due Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF ( And ( ISCHANGED( Customer_Due_Date__c ), ISBLANK(TEXT( Customer_Reason_Change__c ) ), NOT(RecordTypeId = '01213000001WHo8') ), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a reason for changing Customer Due Date
